name: Journey for the Apple iPhone 12 - 128GB - Black
name_original: Journey for the Apple iPhone 12 - 128GB - Black
description:
You are a lonely adventurere who wishes nothing more than the sacred Apple iPhone 12 - 128GB - Black™. Though the only one in existence is guarded by a terrifying dragon. Embark on a quest to prove your strength and slay the dragon guarding the Apple iPhone 12 - 128GB - Black™.

By Nelson Schneider and Daniel Douros

Music credit:

KidNNasty - insectiFEYE

Komiku - Battle of Pogs, Ending, Mushrooms, This is happening

sawsquarenoise - Boss Theme
